My Projects and works

Finding The Best Binary Classification Model to Predict Rain

    Made with:

Rainfall prediction plays an important role especially for the field in the agricultural sector. This prediction result can help farmers and water resources to be utilized efficiently. The methodology that I used:

  • Preprocessing Data and Exploratory Data Analysis
  • Modelling (Logistic Regression, Decision Tree, and Random Forest)
  • Evaluation metrics and hyperparameter tuning

    • Code

    Identify Language of a Text Using Logistic Regression and Multinomial Naive Bayes

      Made with:

    Language Identification (LID) is crucial to many NLP applications, such as to give the right auto-correct suggestions. Here I used Papluca Language Identification (from Hugging Face). The Language Identification dataset is a collection of 90.000 samples and contains text in 20 languages. The methodology that I used:

  • Preprocessing Data and Exploratory Data Analysis
  • Text Preprocessing
  • Modelling (Multinomial Naive Bayes and Logistic Regression)

    • Code

    Predict Weight Fish each Species

      Made with:

    Given a data of Fish Market, we need to predict the wright fish of each species.

    Code

    Predict Purchased or Not Purchased from the Traing and Test Set of Social Network Advertising Data

      Made with:

    Using the data of Social Networking Advertising, predict whether people purchased or not depending on their estimated salary.

    Code

    Finding the Correlation and Covariance of Singapore Airbnb Data

      Made with:

    Using the data of Singapore Airbnb (Kaggle), we need to find the correlation and covariance of the data

    Code

    Predict Purchased or Not Purchased using KNN Classifier with Minkowski Distance Metric

      Made with:

    Using the data of Social Networking Advertising, predict whether people purchased or not depending on their estimated salary by using KNN Classifier.

    Code

    My Research

    Systematic Literature Review of Stemming and Lemmatization Performance for Sentence Similarity

    Information Retrieval (IR) is as important as ever for people to retrieve relevant information in a quick way. The purpose of this study research is to find which preprocessing technique (stemming and lemmatization) is best for sentence similarity tasks.


    The research paper is created in a team with 3 members (me and 2 other friends). We are now preparing for the camera-ready version that will be held in November 4-5, 2022.

    IEEE
